name: Touhou Sleigh Race Vacation
description:
NOTE: The Web version only works with Chrome. Please use the download version if you're on another browser.
(Alt + Enter for Fullscreen mode)

Come join in on a fast-paced sledding vacation through Gensokyo!

When Rei’sen comes down from the Moon for a vacation, Reimu decides to take her sledding. They embark on a top-down racing adventure featuring:

  • Courses filled with twists, turns, and a lot of snow-woman.
  • A full story starring Rei'sen and Reimu.
  • A plethora of bunnies to celebrate the year of the rabbit.
  • Unique Graphics from over five different artists.
  • Remixes of Touhou songs and a Touhou fan arrangement.

Credits

  • EasternMouse: Programming, Game Design (https://easternmouse.itch.io/)
  • Megapig9001: Production, Writing, Dialogue Programming, Game Design (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLLxy5P3iu6G3rxhQ9Icpxg)
  • Panachamon: Race-track Art, Story Background, Ending Art (https://www.instagram.com/pancha_mon/)
  • Jonter64: Story Portraits, Title Screen Art
  • Cinnabinna: Racer (Gameplay) Art, Sled Art (https://twitter.com/cinna_supreme)
  • Konbai: UI, Sound Design, Game Logo (https://twitter.com/c4lin0)
  • JaCoder23: Music (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdLQ-aSddS0WPnWQA87JNow)
  • Aqwa: Intro Comic (https://twitter.com/aqwwa58)
  • Rosy Muscovy: Testing

One of the music tracks is a cover of an arrangement by Diao Ye Zong called "MoonJumper".

The following is a derivative work of the Touhou Project Series. The Touhou Project and its characters, music and story are all owned by Team Shanghai Alice.

Known Issues

  • Certain dialogue from previous scenes repeats (Jam Version only)
